titleStmt.title: Law, or a Discourse therof in four books. Written in French by Sir Hen. Finch Kt. His Majesties Serjeant at Law. And done into English by the same author
titleStmt.author: Nottingham, Heneage Finch, Earl of, 1621-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the assignes of Richard and Edward Atkins Esq; for H. Twyford, F. Tyton, J. Bellinger, M. Place, T. Basset, R. Pawlet, S. Heyrick, C. Wilkinson, T. Dring, W. Jacob. C. Harper, J. Leigh, J. Ammery, J. Place, and J. Poole,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Lincoln's Inn Library, London.
